attributes.name: Inventory Item
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Inventory Item card for stock tracking and management in the Boxel framework. This card should handle all aspects of inventory control including stock levels, reordering, location tracking, and movement history for efficient warehouse and supply chain operations.

## Core Fields

### Item Identification
- **sku**: StringField - Stock Keeping Unit (unique identifier)
- **itemName**: StringField - Descriptive item name
- **barcode**: StringField - UPC/EAN barcode number
- **qrCode**: StringField - QR code data
- **category**: linksTo(InventoryCategory) - Item categorization
- **itemType**: StringField with enum: "raw-material", "component", "finished-good", "consumable", "spare-part"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "active", "discontinued", "obsolete", "pending", "recalled"

### Physical Attributes
- **description**: MarkdownField - Detailed item description
- **weight**: NumberField - Item weight
- **weightUnit**: StringField - kg, lb, oz, g
- **dimensions**: contains(DimensionField) - Length, width, height
- **dimensionUnit**: StringField - cm, in, m, ft
- **color**: StringField - Item color/finish
- **material**: StringField - Primary material composition
- **packagingType**: StringField - Box, pallet, bundle, etc.

### Stock Levels
- **quantityOnHand**: NumberField - Current available stock
- **quantityCommitted**: NumberField - Reserved for orders
- **quantityAvailable**: NumberField - Available to promise (computed)
- **quantityInTransit**: NumberField - Incoming shipments
- **quantityOnOrder**: NumberField - Open purchase orders
- **minimumStock**: NumberField - Reorder point
- **maximumStock**: NumberField - Maximum storage capacity
- **safetyStock**: NumberField - Buffer inventory level

### Location Information
- **primaryLocation**: contains(WarehouseLocation) - Main storage location
- **locations**: containsMany(StockLocation) - All storage locations
- **warehouse**: linksTo(Warehouse) - Primary warehouse
- **zone**: StringField - Warehouse zone (A, B, C)
- **bin**: StringField - Specific bin location
- **pickingOrder**: NumberField - Sequence for picking

### Financial Information
- **unitCost**: NumberField - Cost per unit
- **averageCost**: NumberField - Weighted average cost
- **lastPurchasePrice**: NumberField - Most recent cost
- **standardCost**: NumberField - Standard costing value
- **totalValue**: NumberField - Total inventory value (computed)
- **currency**: StringField - Currency for pricing
- **taxClass**: StringField - Tax classification

### Supplier Information
- **primarySupplier**: linksTo(Supplier) - Main vendor
- **alternativeSuppliers**: linksToMany(Supplier) - Backup vendors
- **manufacturerPartNumber**: StringField - OEM part number
- **supplierPartNumber**: StringField - Vendor's part number
- **leadTime**: NumberField - Days to receive order
- **minimumOrderQuantity**: NumberField - MOQ from supplier
- **orderMultiple**: NumberField - Order in multiples of

### Tracking & Compliance
- **lotTracking**: BooleanField - Track by lot/batch
- **serialTracking**: BooleanField - Track individual serials
- **expirationTracking**: BooleanField - Track expiry dates
- **lots**: containsMany(LotNumber) - Active lot numbers
- **certifications**: containsMany(Certification) - Compliance certs
- **hazmatClass**: StringField - Hazardous material classification
- **storageRequirements**: MarkdownField - Special storage needs

## Required Component Cards

### StockLocation Card
Create a separate StockLocation card with:
- **location**: contains(WarehouseLocation) - Specific location
- **quantity**: NumberField - Quantity at location
- **lotNumber**: StringField - Lot for this stock
- **expirationDate**: DateField - Expiry if applicable
- **condition**: StringField - New, Used, Damaged
- **lastCounted**: DateTimeField - Last physical count
- **quarantined**: BooleanField - On hold status

### InventoryMovement Card
- **movementType**: StringField - Receipt, Issue, Transfer, Adjustment
- **quantity**: NumberField - Amount moved
- **fromLocation**: contains(WarehouseLocation) - Source
- **toLocation**: contains(WarehouseLocation) - Destination
- **movementDate**: DateTimeField - Transaction timestamp
- **reference**: StringField - PO, SO, or transfer number
- **performedBy**: linksTo(Contact) - Who moved it
- **reason**: StringField - Movement reason
- **cost**: NumberField - Value of movement

### ReorderRule Card
- **method**: StringField - Min/Max, EOQ, JIT, Kanban
- **reorderPoint**: NumberField - When to reorder
- **reorderQuantity**: NumberField - How much to order
- **reviewCycle**: StringField - Daily, Weekly, Monthly
- **seasonalAdjustment**: contains(SeasonalRule) - Seasonal variations
- **autoReorder**: BooleanField - Automatic PO creation

## Computed Fields Logic

### Available Quantity Calculation
Quantity On Hand - Quantity Committed = Available to Promise

### Total Value Calculation
Quantity On Hand Ã— Average Cost = Total Inventory Value

### Reorder Status
If (Quantity On Hand + Quantity On Order) <= Reorder Point, flag for reorder

### Turnover Rate
Annual Usage / Average Inventory = Inventory Turns

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive inventory management interface:

**Header Section**
- Item name and SKU prominently displayed
- Status badge (In Stock, Low Stock, Out of Stock)
- Quick actions: Adjust Stock, Transfer, Reorder
- Barcode/QR code display

**Overview Dashboard**
- **Stock Level Gauge**: Visual indicator of current stock
- **Location Map**: Warehouse location visualization
- **Quick Stats**: On hand, committed, available, value
- **Reorder Status**: Alert if below minimum
- **Recent Activity**: Last 5 movements

**Detailed Tabs**
- **Stock Levels**: Current inventory by location
- **Movements**: Transaction history with filters
- **Orders**: Purchase and sales order links
- **Analytics**: Usage trends and forecasts
- **Suppliers**: Vendor information and lead times
- **Documents**: Specs, certificates, images

**Stock Level Panel**
- Location grid showing quantity per location
- Lot/Serial number breakdown
- Expiration date warnings
- Condition status indicators
- Quick transfer interface

**Movement History**
- Chronological transaction list
- Filter by type, date, user
- Running balance column
- Cost impact display
- Reason codes

**Analytics View**
- Stock level trend chart
- Turnover rate gauge
- Usage forecast graph
- ABC analysis indicator
- Stockout risk assessment

### Fitted View Layout
- Item image thumbnail
- Name and SKU
- Stock status indicator (color-coded)
- Primary location
- Quick stock adjustment button

### Mobile Scanner View
- Camera barcode scanner
- Quick lookup results
- Stock adjustment form
- Location transfer
- Count verification

## Interactive Features

### Quick Actions
- Adjust stock levels with reason
- Transfer between locations
- Create purchase order
- Print labels
- Cycle count entry

### Bulk Operations
- Mass location updates
- Bulk transfers
- Import/export inventory
- Batch adjustments
- Global updates

### Real-time Updates
- Live stock level changes
- Movement notifications
- Low stock alerts
- Expiration warnings
- Order status updates

## Styling Requirements
- Clean warehouse aesthetic
- Color-coded stock status
- Mobile-optimized for warehouse use
- High contrast for scanning
- Large touch targets
- Offline capability
- Print-friendly labels
- Barcode font support

## Validation Rules
- SKU must be unique
- Quantities cannot be negative
- Location must exist in system
- Lot numbers must be unique per SKU
- Expiration dates must be future (for new receipts)
- Movements must balance (in = out)
- Cost values must be positive
- Reorder point must be less than maximum

## Integration Points
- **ERP Systems**: SAP, Oracle, NetSuite
- **WMS**: Manhattan, Blue Yonder
- **Barcode Scanners**: Zebra, Honeywell
- **RFID Systems**: Real-time tracking
- **Purchase Order Systems**: Procurement integration
- **Sales Order Systems**: Allocation and picking
- **Shipping Systems**: Pack and ship integration
- **Accounting**: Inventory valuation sync
- **Forecasting Tools**: Demand planning
- **IoT Sensors**: Temperature, humidity monitoring

## Business Logic Requirements
- FIFO/LIFO/FEFO picking logic
- Automatic reorder generation
- ABC analysis classification
- Safety stock calculation
- Lead time variability handling
- Seasonal adjustment factors
- Lot mixing rules
- Expiration date management
- Cross-docking support
- Consignment inventory tracking
- Multi-location allocation
- Inventory aging analysis
- Shrinkage tracking
- Cycle counting schedules
